src:
特別打扮揪友海釣　佘詩曼兩手空空只有夕陽美照
02 Nov 2019, 07:34 by 梁欣喬
《延禧攻略》「嫻妃」佘詩曼平日工作忙碌，但她亦不忘抽空跟好友聚會，今（2日）她在社交網站上放上昨天跟三五好友出海釣魚的出遊照，這次行程中，原來全團人中只有她一個人空手而回。不過期間碰上日落時分，她立即把握機會拍下美麗一刻。照片中的她坐在船邊望向遠方，背景是一片橙色夕陽，畫面十分唯美。


港星佘詩曼平日工作忙碌，但她亦不忘抽空跟好友聚會，事前還特別弄頭髮。（翻攝自佘詩曼臉書）

在社交網站她寫下：「想梳一個美美的頭去釣魚比賽，由早上玩到夜晚，結果所有人都收穫豐富，就我一個空手而回，比賽輸得徹底，但贏得一張超美的黃昏相，恭喜所有團友。」


釣不到魚的佘詩曼，卻在此行中拍下美照，照片中的她坐在船邊望向遠方，背景是一片橙色夕陽，畫面十分唯美。（翻攝自佘詩曼臉書）

前日剛從大陸出席美容品牌活動回港的佘詩曼，近來工作密密麻麻，幾乎每星期都要飛到大陸工作，她也十分享受這樣的空中飛人的生活。對於新戲何時開工？佘詩曼坦言不急，正慢慢挑選合適劇本，目前光是出席活動及業配邀約就夠她忙不完了。
更新時間｜2019.11.02 07:33
text:
Specially dressed as a friend of the sea fishing, Charmaine's empty hands only the sunset beauty
02 Nov 2019, 07:34 by Liang Xinqiao
"Yanqi Raiders" "娴妃" 佘 曼 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平 平It turned out that only one of the whole group was alone and returned empty-handed. However, during the sunset, she immediately seized the opportunity to take a beautiful moment. In the photo, she sits on the side of the boat and looks into the distance. The background is an orange sunset, and the picture is very beautiful.


Hong Kong Star Charmaine is busy at work on weekdays, but she also does not forget to take time out to meet her friends, and she has special hair beforehand. (Reversal from 佘诗曼Facebook)

On the social networking site, she wrote: "I want to comb a beautiful head to go fishing, from morning to night, and everyone gets rich, so I go back empty-handed, the game loses completely, but wins a super beautiful dusk. Congratulations to all the group members."


Charmaine, who can't catch fish, took a beautiful photo in the trip. In the photo, she sat on the side of the boat and looked into the distance. The background was an orange sunset, and the picture was very beautiful. (Reversal from 佘诗曼Facebook)

She has recently returned to Hong Kong from the mainland to attend a beauty brand event. She has been working very hard recently and has to fly to the mainland almost every week. She also enjoys the life of such a trapeze. When will the new show start? Charmaine is not in a hurry, and is slowly picking the right script. At present, it is enough for her to attend the event and the match with the industry.
Update time|2019.11.02 07:33
